content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 2, Chelsea 2.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 2, Chelsea 2.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Chelsea 2. Fernando Torres (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ashley Cole following a fast break.
Attempt missed. Carles Puyol (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Xavi with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Petr Cech.
Attempt saved. Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Raul Meireles (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Raul Meireles (Chelsea).
Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Dani Alves (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Xavi following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Ashley Cole.
Fernando Torres (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Xavi.
Offside, Barcelona. Lionel Messi tries a through ball, but Dani Alves is caught offside.
Substitution, Chelsea. Fernando Torres replaces Didier Drogba.
Attempt missed. Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Dani Alves with a headed pass.
Attempt blocked. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Cristian Tello.
Substitution, Barcelona. Seydou Keita replaces Cesc Fàbregas.
Attempt blocked. Xavi (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Lionel Messi.

Foul by Frank Lampard (Chelsea).
Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Lionel Messi (Barcelona).
Frank Lampard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Chelsea. Petr Cech tries a through ball, but Salomon Kalou is caught offside.
Substitution, Barcelona. Cristian Tello replaces Isaac Cuenca.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Ramires.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by José Bosingwa.
Attempt missed. Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) with an attempt from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Frank Lampard with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Javier Mascherano.
Hand ball by Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona).
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Petr Cech.
Attempt saved. Isaac Cuenca (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Petr Cech (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt missed. Carles Puyol (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right following a set piece situation.
Substitution, Chelsea. Salomon Kalou replaces Juan Mata.
Foul by Ashley Cole (Chelsea).
Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Didier Drogba (Chelsea) right footed shot from more than 40 yards on the right wing is saved in the bottom right corner.
Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Dani Alves with a cross.
Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona).

Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Penalty missed! Still  Barcelona 2, Chelsea 1. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) hits the bar with a left footed shot.
Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card.
Penalty Barcelona. Cesc Fàbregas draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Didier Drogba (Chelsea) after a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Branislav Ivanovic.
Attempt blocked. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Second Half begins Barcelona 2, Chelsea 1.
First Half ends, Barcelona 2, Chelsea 1.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by José Bosingwa.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Chelsea 1. Ramires (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Frank Lampard with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Didier Drogba (Chelsea) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left.
Ramires (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Chelsea 0. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a through ball.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Xavi.
